challenge.title: Sound Simulator - Let's Learn Pure Data!
challenge.description: Sound Simulator's Pure Data tutorial on YouTube is a great introduction to programming music and synthesis using Pure Data.
challenge.instructions: Watch Sound Simulator's Pure Data tutorial on YouTube, then program some songs!
